string-array.name: electric_tips
string-array.item: Hanging laundry outside instead of using a tumble dryer can save ~153kg CO2 a year.
Turning down heating by 1 degree Celsius can reduce energy consumption by 8%%.
Use energy saving light bulbs; LEDs can save 90%% of lighting costs and compact fluorescent lights use 75 to 80%% less electricity.
Take shorter showers; 15%% of a typical energy bill is spent heating water.
Look for an Energy Star logo when replacing electrical appliances.
You have emitted %dkg of CO2 with your electricity usage alone, consider switching to natural gas.
